snippet.title: Criticom Trailer 1996
snippet.description:
Criticom Trailer 1996

Official Content From Vic Tokai

An ancient Relic with mystical powers has been stolen. To get it back, you must challenge your enemies to a winner takes all Critical Combat tournament. Return the Relic to its rightful place and restore the peace.
Platforms: Sega Saturn

Sega Saturn
, Martial Arts,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Criticom
